name: Legendary Journeys: The Eye of Baal
name_original: Legendary Journeys: The Eye of Baal
description:
Legendary Journeys is a free roaming blobber with turn-based combat set in the world of Farmoor. You create your party of adventurers and set out to honor an old man's request. Travel the world and crawl through the darkest dungeons in search of treasures while you seek the items needed to free the old man's son from his magical prison.

Note: this is an ALPHA build of the game. It does contain bugs. It is not optimized; so, it will not run on a toaster. If you do take it for a spin, please, leave any feedback you may have. 

 Also, there are some DEV cheats in the build! 

  • The warrior class has a BLUE BOLT ability which kills the enemy party in one shot (comes in handy when you want to skip some combat).
  • Press the HOME key to bring up the GODGATE. It's my quick travel button.
  • I'm sure I left some other cheats in there. 

FEATURES

  • Turn Based Combat
  • Free Movement (no grids)
  • Crafting - weapons, armors, enchanted items
  • Class System - with some sway in the skills your characters can learn
  • Overworld and Dungeon zones for your party to explore
  • Obligatory loot and monsters to slay
  • A main story(quest) to follow
  • Side quests, of course

CONTROLS

---These can be remapped in the small dialog window: THIS will be different in the future.
W - Forward
S - Back
A - Left
D - Right

Hold RIGHT mouse button for mouse look
Holding the LEFT Mouse Button over a mob will show you the group make-up and estimated strength versus the party.

This game is currently in development (since 2016) with a projected release date for late 2019.
